base_description: Tall, gray refrigerator with a minimalist design.
part_description: Two main compartments, top freezer and bottom fridge, each with a door. Silver handles on the right side.
internal_interaction_description: The top freezer compartment maintains a colder temperature for frozen items, while the bottom fridge compartment keeps perishable food at a cool, but not freezing, temperature. Both compartments have separate doors, allowing independent access and temperature control.
external_interaction_description: The refrigerator interacts with external elements by storing food and drinks for preservation. It requires a power source to operate and is commonly placed in kitchens. Users interact with it by opening doors to access stored items.
